meanings.definition: The act or process of equipping with a motor.
meanings.sent1: The motorization of the boat made it faster.
meanings.sent3: The motorization of the toy car brought it to life.
meanings.sent4: His words had a motorization that drove the audience to action.
meanings.sent5: The motorization of the wheelchair allowed greater mobility.

meanings.definition: The state of being equipped with a motor.
meanings.sent1: The motorization of the vehicle was evident in its speed.
meanings.sent2: The motorization of the lawnmower made yard work easier.
meanings.sent3: The motorization of the blender made smoothies in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a motorization that brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The motorization of the fan kept the room cool.
